headline: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) Teams Up With Google For AI Advancements In Aerospace
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) announced a significant collaboration with Google Public Sector to integrate advanced generative AI technologies into its AI Factory ecosystem, enhancing capabilities across national security and aerospace sectors. Despite this, the company's stock price movement was relatively flat over the last month, with a 1% decline. This flat performance occurred amid market concerns over inflation and weak consumer sentiment, as reflected by broader decreases in major indices...
